description: light red wood bank with gold front door panel and coin slot; 2 combination locks at top of door, eagle below and glass panel at very bottom; combination info sticker on bottom; letter from manufacturer inside (see file)
inscription:
Inscriptions and Sticker

inside on locking mechanism, incised: [PAT\'D FEB. 11. 1902]; inside, below locking mechanism, incised: [95]; on front, on shield on eagle: [US]
markings: on bottom, manufacturer\'s sticker with combo lock info, begins: [Antiqrafts (...)]
title: "U.S. Post Office Box" still bank
